description: Connecting the flavor of Salt Vinegar chips to the joyous celebration of The Chinese New Year  this auspicious holiday marks the beginning of a prosperous year ahead.

chip_name: On The Border Cafe Style Tortilla
description: Celebrate Mexican Independence Day with our On The Border Cafe Style Tortilla chips, infused with the vibrant flavors and traditions of Mexico's beloved street food scene.
Marking the foundation of modern-day Korea on this special day, we celebrate the vibrant flavors that define its culinary culture.
